item.title: How to deploy your own cryptocurrency trading bot? üí∞
item.description: It seems like the crypto boom is far gone, but there’s still people making a living from online cryptocurrency trading. Let’s find out how we can automatize this proccess deploying a trading bot that buys and sells by it self based on predefined strategies using the Gekko platform.

item.title: Amperage theme kitchen sink
item.description: This is a demo page for all the components in the Amperage theme. This posts is updated on every version release of Amperage. Last updated on January 16th, 2020.

item.title: Top 3 ways I monetize my tech blog! (no traffic required) üí∏
item.description: Many people dream to become a freelance blogger and make a living online. It’s not an easy endeavor but here are the best ways to make money with your blog with no intial traffic requirements, check it out!

item.title: How to share your local on the internet with Ngrok? üì°
item.description: Have you ever wondered how to show that client your amazing demo with no staging environment? The answer is HTTP tunneling, this technique allows you to share your local development server on the internet. Let’s find out how it all works, the different tools available and how to use ngrok or localtunnel + docker on your own projects.
